  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssetBusiness

    public IAsset

    interface IAsset

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void queryAssets(java.lang.String parentAssetId, int pageNumber, int pageSize, ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.asset.bean.AssetsBean> listener)

    • Method Detail

      • queryAssets

        void queryAssets(java.lang.String parentAssetId,
                 int pageNumber,
                 int pageSize,
                 ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.asset.bean.AssetsBean> listener)

        Request all actionable assets of the current user.

        Parameters:
        parentAssetId - Provide a parent assetID, otherwise the top level. Default is the top level.
        pageNumber - The page number of the pagination request. Default is 0.
        pageSize - The result count of each request. Default is 20.
        listener - A callback returns a the result of assets if succeed, otherwise an error.

      • queryDevicesByAssetId

        void queryDevicesByAssetId(java.lang.String assetId,
                           java.lang.String lastRowKey,
                           int pageSize,
                           ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.asset.bean.AssetDeviceListBean> listener)

        Get a list of devices which bind to a specific asset.

        Parameters:
        assetId - The asset ID for getting its devices.
        lastRowKey - The lat row key for getting its devices.
        pageSize - The page size for getting its devices.
        listener - A callback returns a list of VagueDevice if succeed, otherwise an error.
